storyInfo: Despite observing all of Sami's wonders and being cautious on their journey so far, Chilchuck fails to stop the rest of his party from eating the very strange looking hornbeast, and can only watch as they turn into Collapsals.

attributes.content: Gah—
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: You're awake.
...Who are you?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Call me Arges.
attributes.name: Arges

attributes.content: I foresaw an accident in the forest today, so I decided to patrol the area, where I found you unconscious in the snow.
attributes.name: Arges

attributes.content: ...Have you seen my companions?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: I'm sorry.
attributes.name: Arges

attributes.content: ...Tch, I should go look for them.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Gah—
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: You're quite injured. You should rest here first.
attributes.name: Arges

attributes.content: You don't seem to be Samifjod.
attributes.name: Arges

attributes.content: ...My friends and I were looking for a way home, and a guy called Oakcup told us Sami's will was guiding us to go north.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Oakcup... the oak-child.
attributes.name: Arges

attributes.content: You know him?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: I've heard that in Sami the name is synonymous with 'wisdom.'
attributes.name: Arges

attributes.content: 'Wisdom'...? Then... Do you know of the Cyclopes?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: ...What's wrong?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: I have witnessed many ensnared by misfortune. Death itself... is no stranger to me.
attributes.name: Arges

attributes.content: Yet, why do I see so many deaths in you?
attributes.name: Arges

attributes.content: No sign of Chilchuck?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Yeah...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: We should at least be glad for the thick snow and trees here. He should have handled that fall easily.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Mm... but if he get attacked by monsters, he won't stand a chance, so we should still find him as fast as we can.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: It'll be terrible if he ran into that hornbeast from earlier.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Aye. But we have another problem—
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Sorry.
*sigh*...It's not your fault.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: But what are you doing all by yourself in this forest, miss?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: I'm hunting...
Do you live here, lass?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Nope, I live on Rhodes Island!
RHODES ISLAND?! That's the place we've been looking for.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Huh? You wanna go to Rhodes Island?
Yeah, we're trying to find our way home, and someone told us we could get help there.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: You lost your way home? So sad…
Are you from Rhodes Island? Can you take us there?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Eh... But I don't wanna go back yet...
Why not?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: 'Cause I'm still hungry!
Is that all?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Then if we feed you till you're satisfied, will you take us there?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Mm, sure!
...I didn't expect to find a lead like this.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Could this be what Sami was guiding us towards all along?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: But...
I just lost track of the prey I had my eye on.
We have our own food—Ah.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Guess we lost it all in the chaos earlier.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: ...How about this?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: First, you help us find our companion. Then, we'll help you hunt whatever you want. And finally, you take us to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Mm! Okay!
What an innocent lass. What's your name?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: I'm Ceobe, but you can call me Kay!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: You saw death in me...?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Arges

attributes.content: Many deaths, in fact. Both in the past and the future, yet here you stand now, alive.
attributes.name: Arges

attributes.content: That Oakcup guy said Cyclopes can see the future.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Are you one of them?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Arges

attributes.content: Then please, tell me my fate.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: ...Cyclopes can only see doom.
attributes.name: Arges

attributes.content: That's fine. Just tell me the fates of me and my companions.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Your companions walk toward the endless icefields...
attributes.name: Arges

attributes.content: No, they do not go of their own will. They were... swallowed up, by the dark and the void.
attributes.name: Arges

attributes.content: What's that mean?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: They were corrupted by demons.
attributes.name: Arges

attributes.content: Demons?! No one mentioned any demons!
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Demons... are a vagrant existence on this land.
attributes.name: Arges

attributes.content: They corrode and envelop all that they touch.
attributes.name: Arges

attributes.content: Corrupted creatures lose all sense of self, as if swallowed into the void—
attributes.name: Arges

attributes.text: On its face is a black... black? No, it is a blank, an endless void.
The first thing that comes to mind is the galaxy of stars one can see in the night sky.
A cow with a void as its face. They find this reality hard to believe.
What's even more shocking is what lies dead center in the blank space. A circle.
A circle somehow even darker than the void surrounding it.
Darker than the night, deeper than the void.
But how can this dark circle seem to emit light?
Because it isn't. The circle is really a hole that sucks in all the light near it, to the point that it seems to be glowing.
Darker than the night, brighter than the light...

attributes.content: Those creatures have a circle on their faces...
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Just like a single eye on a head.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Have you already seen a corrupted creature?!
attributes.name: Arges

attributes.content: Chilchuck ponders for a moment before pressing his hand on his injured arm and exiting the cave.
Can a doom you see be avoided?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: All I can say is that I try.
attributes.name: Arges

attributes.content: ...Then so will I.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: So you're saying Rhodes Island is a giant ship?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Yeah! It's huuuge and it goes everywhere!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Oh, so that's why we never found it!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: *sniff*
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: What's wrong?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Smells like blood. My prey's blood. The one-eyed monster is nearby!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: What a keen sense of smell.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Hm? Kay, did you just say 'one-eyed monster'?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Yeah. A hornbeast with only one eye on its face. So a 'one-eyed monster,' right?
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Eek... do you guys still remember what Oakcup said?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: About the Cyclopes.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Maybe that was just a suggestion, not a certain answer.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Maybe Sami didn't mean for us to find an actual Cyclops.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Maybe It just predicted we would find Kay, and knew we would encounter a 'hornbeast' like that?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Either way, since we've run into it again...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: We'll just have to deal with it.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Is it dead?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Mm.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Phew... This should put our mind at ease about Chilchuck, at least a little.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Now let's go find him.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: I've got a suggestion.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: What if we started a fire here, instead of running around aimlessly?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: It might attract some wild beasts, but Chilchuck could spot us too.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Uh... But—
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Either way, we can't really do much on an empty stomach.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: You're right.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Even if he doesn't see it, we should feed ourselves first if we want the energy to keep searching afterward.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: So what do we do with this 'one-eyed' hornbeast?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Let's eat it! Together!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Aye, sounds good.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: But—
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: I've heard of traditions where people will kill and eat an animal as a sacrifice to the gods, hoping for divine revelation.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: My guess is the will of Sami was hoping for us to do something similar.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Then—
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Don't even try to pretend, Laios. You were planning to eat it from the start.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Let's start a fire first.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Hopefully, Chilchuck will see it.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: It's done!
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Ugh—I'm being serious here, the meat looks bizarre.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Already tasted it. Doesn't seem too different from regular meat.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Fine, I guess. We've already eaten stranger things than this.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Wow, it's actually pretty good!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: What are you doing over there, Kay?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Looking to see if there's an even bigger one!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Hoo, guess not. No sight of that Durin who fell earlier either.
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Come join us for a meal first. We'll go look for him together afterward.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Okay, coming!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Hey—!
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Whoa! You're that Durin!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: *pant*—*pant*—
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: And you're the girl who popped out of nowhere.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Sorry I made you fall.
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: *pant*... *pant*... It's fine. You guys alright?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Mm, we're all good.
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Great.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: I knew that doom was avoidable.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: They're making steaks and skewers over there. Said they'll keep looking for you after eating.
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Let's go together? I bet they'll be so happy to see you.
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Tch. Of course they're eating even at a time like this. What was I worried about?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Wait, steak? What kind of steak?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: The 'One-eyed monster' kind.
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: 'One-eyed monster'?!
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: You guys... they can't have...
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Oh look, here they come.
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Perfect timing. I'm going to give them a piece of my mind—
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Hey, you guys can't just—
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Chilchuck turns around and is about to begin scolding his friends for leaving him behind for a barbecue.
But his words clog up in his throat.
Time to go home, guys.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: We have stayed too long in this world.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: We can't let Falin wait any longer.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: It's time to harvest the crops on the golems. I still have Red Dragon meat to cook.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Their faces, now blanketed by the void, are no longer the familiar visages he once knew.
Their voices start to break and distort, until Chilchuck isn't even sure how they're speaking.
You guys... ate that corrupted hornbeast?!
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Chil■■■■■, what are you still ■■■■■ here? Let's go ■■■■.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Where... are you guys going?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: North, the northern ■■■■.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: End, door, go home, go ■■■■.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: There's a door in the north we can use to go home?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Is this Sami's guidance?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: But how do you guys know all this?!
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: We ■■■■, we come from that ■■■■.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: ■■ return to that ■■■■.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: P■th, h■m■, F■l■n—
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Chilchuck feels a mess of emotions welling up.
Panic and resignation wash over him—doom feels inevitable. His own party members are now in dire straits, and he is powerless to help them.
But he also feels a little angry...
Because the reason for their distress... is entirely their own damn fault!
Chilchuck is sure he only blinked once, but the trio suddenly appear near him.
The next second, they are by his side.
From his perspective, they seem to have moved in a flash, as if the holes in their faces swallowed the space between them.
Soon, they disappear into the depths of the forest.
Chilchuck stands still for a moment before breaking into a deep sigh.
He hears the Cyclops approaching behind him, and sees the puzzled look on the girl's face.
He does not wait or hesitate, but begins sprinting towards where his companions vanished.
He is too embarrassed to explain what happened here to the Cyclops and her sorrowful gaze.
They are his companions after all... of course he can't just watch them disappear for good like that.
GUYS! COULD YOU JUST—SLOW DOWN!!!
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: An angry roar echoes in the skies above the Myrkwood, lingering for a long time.
Wait for me! I wanna join you guys too!
attributes.name: Ceobe
